body: They couldn't have just... stayed in contact with each other? What the hell is this ending?
still the best one but sad end

Wow, that’s a terrible thing to do. Just like otomono said. Leaving with just a note is such an awful way to say goodbye. Why not leave but be a couple. Or promise to meet later or something. Smh, makes no sense.

a wild turbulent orgy in a close knit neighbourhood amidst a dispense of wide array of emotions. The ending as usual The popular one, for a depressed shoujo fangirl who reckons they get power by relinquishing the mast which has shown them the horizon and loving them for what they are,a true oxymoron.. You arent doing him a favour by diving head deep in that despair again. You're destroying him and deep down you know that...
The analogy is akin to a playboy leaving a girl after consumating their relationship unilaterally by leaving a note which puts her on a guilt trip.
this story doesn’t make any sense, stay away from it, you’ll bitterly regret reading this crap

to confusing ....why shisa know the place where his mother is fucking takeshi? it seems not the first time ..who is takeshi? a customer? a  affair?  ...in the first pages in the ruckus when mr hara broke the window... is really like takeshi said to haru that they went to take few drinks? or MR hara cough him leaving his house after fucking misako? remember that misako open the door not wearing a bra and takeshi suspiciously insist to not talk about the incident. even MR hara say " you take me like a fool to " implied that takeshi is not the only one passing by his house , sooo misako is really a prostitute like shisa say or is just a jealousy tantrun . this is the only thing  that can make sense to the eager to leave town and leave all behind and start over
it had me feeling envious of the relationship they had but wtf dude? the ending was a cold hard slap to the face -_-
Just Epic
@neonking - Then seek treatment...
Fuck man now im crying
was almost perfect, but had to shit up the ending, fuck the author.
I hate endings like that...

Author is a jerk. like seriously. He literally slapped us the saying "if you love someone, you have to learn to let it go"
It would still be a good ending if the heroine hints that she'll be back afterwards, but this line "don't be scared to ask a girl to marry you" is such a deal breaker for a bittersweet ending. Now fellas, this is what you call a "GREAT STORY WITH BITTER-ONLY ENDING"
love the oyakodon
The end is not that bad, but man, it is for a hentai.
come on~~~! bit by bit, my feelings is killing me :(
I came here to feel my dick, not feel these emotions
ending?? -.-a joke right?
This was a bit of a roller coaster… But seriously, wtf is with the ending.
now, whenever i think she might be doing *the deed* with the other guy.. it just makes me EERRKKK...
so confusing... but I kinda get the feeling that things might have been different if that guy wasn't so indecisive when she asked to marry..

Dang forgot to look over the tag "Cheater".

dat ending T~T... I don't get the whole Takeshi bit, wish they showed a bit more backstory, I never got how/why she'd love him.
Ah....those bitter sweet feels... you win some and lose some, but those experiences are what make us grow
